mapper.update: update oaNumberRecord set value=#{value} where type='notext'
update T_CON_CONTRACTWITHOUTTEXT set fstate='1SAVED',FSOURCEFUNCTION=null where fid=#{easid}
mapper.select:
select bill.fid as id,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FNAME as title, bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FSTATE as state,pc.FAMOUNT as balance, bill.FCONTRACTTYPEID as contractTypeId,ct.FNAME_L2 as contractTypeName, bill.FProgrammingContract as programContractId,pc.FNAME_L2 as programContractName, bill.FCURRENCYID as currencyId,cur.FNAME_L2 as currencyName, bill.FAMOUNT as amount,bill.FORIGINALAMOUNT as oriAmount, sup.FNAME_L2 as receiverName,bill.FSIGNDATE as signDate, u.FNAME_L2 as creatorName,bill.FCREATETIME as createTime, bill.FPERSONID as personId,p.FNAME_L2 as personName,ct.FISWEBPC as needHygh, pb.FREALSUPPLIERID as receiveUnitId,sup2.FNAME_L2 as realReceiveUnitName from T_CON_CONTRACTWITHOUTTEXT bill left join T_FDC_ContractType ct on ct.fid=bill.FCONTRACTTYPEID left join T_CON_ProgrammingContract pc on pc.fid=bill.FProgrammingContract left join T_BD_CURRENCY cur on cur.fid=bill.FCURRENCYID left join t_bd_supplier sup on sup.fid=bill.FRECEIVEUNITID left join T_PM_USER u on u.fid=bill.FCREATORID left join T_BD_Person p on p.fid=bill.FPERSONID left join T_BD_Person p1 on p1.fid=bill.FApplierId left join T_CON_PayRequestBill pb on pb.FCONTRACTID = bill.fid left join t_bd_supplier sup2 on sup2.fid=pb.FREALSUPPLIERID left join T_FDC_CURPROJECT cp on cp.fid=bill.FCurProjectID
and cp.FFULLORGUNIT=#{orgId}
and bill.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and bill.fname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and ct.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractTypeName}),'%')
and sup2.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{receiverName}),'%') or p.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{receiverName}),'%')
and bill.FAMOUNT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{amount}),'%')
and bill.FORIGINALAMOUNT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{oriAmount}),'%')
and bill.fstate like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{state}),'%')
and #{bookDate} < bill.FBOOKEDDATE and bill.FBOOKEDDATE <= #{bizDate}
and u.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{creatorName}),'%')
and u.fnumber =#{authorNum} or p1.fnumber =#{authorNum}
and bill.FCurProjectID in
#{item}
order by bill.FBOOKEDDATE desc,bill.fnumber desc

select value from oaNumberRecord where type like '%notext%'
